name: Ext_R2_EpisodeOfCare_condition
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.EpisodeOfCare.condition for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents EpisodeOfCare.condition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Conditions/problems/diagnoses this episode of care is for
element.definition: A list of conditions/problems/diagnoses that this episode of care is intended to be providing care for.
element.comment: `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition` maps to R4 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition`.  So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.
